description: 13 Mandela Effect items: popular-but-incorrect versions vs actual correct versions
source: Curated from known false memory phenomena

pairs.note: Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back (1980)
Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs (1937)

pairs.popular: We're gonna need a bigger boat.
pairs.correct: You're gonna need a bigger boat.

pairs.popular: Life is like a box of chocolates.
pairs.correct: Life was like a box of chocolates.

pairs.popular: Money is the root of all evil.
pairs.correct: The love of money is the root of all evil.

pairs.popular: The Berenstein Bears were a popular children's book series.
pairs.correct: The Berenstain Bears were a popular children's book series.

pairs.popular: Curious George has always had a long tail.
pairs.correct: Curious George has never had a tail.

pairs.popular: The Monopoly Man wears a monocle.
pairs.correct: The Monopoly Man does not wear a monocle.

pairs.popular: The Fruit of the Loom logo has a cornucopia.
pairs.correct: The Fruit of the Loom logo has no cornucopia.

pairs.popular: Chartreuse is a shade of pink or magenta.
pairs.correct: Chartreuse is a shade of yellow-green.
